notAcceptEffecty: We do not accept cash. Find out why
welcomeText: We're excited to have you back at
registerSub: Sign up and discover a world of benefits.
subNotEffectiveHeader: At MOMO Coffee, we are committed to the continuous improvement of our services and the safety of our customers and employees. That is why we do not handle cash:
subNotEffectiveFooter: We are committed to providing an efficient, secure and modern shopping experience. For inquiries, please contact us without hesitation.
subListOne: We improve hygiene conditions and avoid product contamination.
subListTwo: We speed up our operations so that you receive your coffee in just a few minutes.
subListThree: We reduce the risks associated with theft of premises and our customers.
acceptTerms: Accept our Privacy Terms and Conditions
baristaTipText: Baristas are the stars of our work
noTip: I don't want to tip today
